channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Streetlight not working at entrance of Butterfield Court, 8th December
item.description:
The street light at the entrance to Butterfield Court, Bishops Cleeve, by the flats, has not been working for some months now. Could you arrange for it to be fixed please? There are only two lights on Butterfield Court and it is dark without it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1,2,3,4,5,6, Butterfield Court, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 8th December
item.description:
The soakaway is not taking water very quickly, it is taking toking much longer than usual. the pipes must be blocked or the ditches are ful at some point. The water comes out at the rear of the golf course but there is not much water coming through.

item.title: Large pothole, getting bigger, 8th December
item.description:
On road outside No.8 East End Road. Pothole has got about twice as big in last week with the rain. When vans and buses go hit the pothole I can feel the vibrations in my house (No. 8).

item.title: Recycling collection made by standard rubbish truck, 8th December
item.description:
This morning our recycling collection was made by a standard rubbish truck, it was all mixed in together, and is probably therefore destined for landfill. This is really annoying given the lengths I go to to separate the recycling. Especially annoying since a recycle truck was in our street 30 minutes earlier visiting the houses around the corner.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, The Park, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
